attributes.additional_details:
Before 8am, after winning the vote:

Nigel Farage told Good Morning Britain it was a "mistake" for the Leave campaign to claim there'd be £350m a week extra for the NHS after Brexit .

Daniel Hannan said: "Of course there is still going to be immigration. There are still going to be people coming here to work..."

Dr Liam Fox said: "A lot of things were said in advance of this referendum that we might want to think about again and that (invoking article 50) is one of them. 

This is unacceptable
attributes.background:
We respectfully request that you declare the EU Referendum invalid on the grounds that the voters were wilfully mislead and given false information.

It is entirely unacceptable to offer inaccurate information to people making a world changing decision. 

Please invalidate this referendum.
